name: Purrchasers
description:
Purrchasers is a fast paced online co-op shopping game where two players collaborate as a driver and catcher to drive around a grocery store and collect needed shopping items. Drifting and speeding though stacks of cans gives extra points, aswell as finding the right objects to collect. Watch out for security guards!

Online co-op works through Steam. Start by downloading the build and adding the game to your Steam library. Launch the game through your Steam Library. 

To play :
Option A: Make sure you have launched the game first From the Main Menu, press PLAY. When you are in the Lobby, press START ONLINE, and invite your friends to your game from your friends list.

Option B: Make sure that you have the game launched and either wait for an invite OR click on the Host’s steam profile and choose “Join Game”
